H0.text: Reducing the number of job-related injuries is one way in which workplace automation can have a negative effect on society.

H1.text: Producing manufactured objects at a faster rate is one way in which workplace automation can have a negative effect on society.

H2.text: Displacing skilled workers from manufacturing jobs is one way in which workplace automation can have a negative effect on society.

H3.text: Decreasing the availability of manufactured products is one way in which workplace automation can have a negative effect on society.

A4.text: Displaced workers are most frequently found in the manufacturing industry (ex: steel, automotive, coal).
